content.text: Welcome to your first Dutch lesson! Imagine you're in a cozy coffee shop ('koffietentje') in Utrecht. Your goal is to order your first coffee. Let's start with how to say hello and get the barista's attention.

data.phrase: Ik zou graag iets willen bestellen.
data.meaning: I would like to order something.

data.tip: The Dutch 'g' is a soft, throaty sound, similar to the 'ch' in the Scottish word 'loch'.

content.title: Greeting the Barista
content.setting: You're at the counter of a cozy 'koffietentje' in Utrecht. The barista smiles at you.

conversation_flow.title: Say good morning.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Goedemorgen! Zeg het maar. Wat kan ik voor je doen?

conversation_flow.title: Say you would like to order something.

content.text: Great! Now for the main event: ordering the drink. A 'koffie verkeerd' (literally 'wrong coffee') is the Dutch version of a café au lait. It's a perfect, gentle first order.

content.title: Placing Your Order
content.setting: The barista is waiting for you to tell them what you want.

conversation_flow.title: Say you will drink it here.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, één koffie verkeerd. Wil je die hier opdrinken of meenemen?

content.text: Almost done! Time to pay. In the Netherlands, 'pinnen' is the extremely common verb for paying with a debit card. It's what you'll almost always do in a shop.

data.pinnen: to pay by card (with a PIN)

content.title: Paying for Your Coffee
content.setting: The barista gets your coffee ready and is about to tell you the price.

conversation_flow.title: Ask how much it costs.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Komt eraan! Hier is je koffie alvast.

conversation_flow.title: Say you will pay by card ('pinnen').
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dat is dan drie euro en veertig cent (€3,40), alsjeblieft.

conversation_flow.title: Say thank you and goodbye.
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Prima. Het pinapparaat staat hier. Je kunt je kaart invoeren.
conversation_flow.final_message: Betaling is gelukt. Alsjeblieft! Geniet van je koffie en nog een fijne dag!
